name: TOY-TEM
description:
🔶🔵🔺🟨🔷🟩🔻🟡🔶🔵🔺🟨🔷🟩🔻🟡

REBUILD TOWERS BY COLOR

TOY-TEM is a cute game about rebuilding a tower made of friendly toys. Made by Bastinus Rex and Julialalart during GGJ 2020, the theme was "Repair".

HOW TO PLAY:

(You just need a mouse to play)

 -Left click to select →  The first toy you select is going to be stacked on top of the next toy you select.

-Right click on a empty space to deselect
-Right click on a tower to unstack all the toys

-Zoom in and out with the scrollwheel (beware, there is no clamping)
